title: Net work done on object as function of F and D

content.question: An object is moving in the positive x-direction while a net force directed along the x-axis is exerted on the object. The figure above shows the force as a function of position. What is the net work done on the object over the distance shown?

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
